thread.title: Barclays and Deutsche among seven in Swiss precious metals trading probe
thread.title_full: Barclays and Deutsche among seven in Swiss precious metals trading probe

author: Financial News
title: Barclays and Deutsche among seven in Swiss precious metals trading probe
text:
Barclays and Deutsche among seven in Swiss precious metals trading probe By John Revill, WSJ 28 September 2015 Competition authorities in Switzerland said on September 28 that they are investigating seven big banks over the possible manipulation of the prices of gold, silver and other precious metals.
